subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Gaeta, a retired construction worker who has watched or listened to most Giants and Yankees games since he began rooting for them in the mid-1930s, used to play stick ball with Whitey Ford as a kid.
snippet: Joe Gaeta, a retired construction worker who has watched or listened to most Giants and Yankees games since he began rooting for them in the mid-1930s, used to play stick ball with Whitey Ford as a kid.
